description: Gets information about a wireless gateway.

parameters.name: Identifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the wireless gateway to get.

parameters.name: IdentifierType
parameters.description: The type of identifier used in identifier.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the resource.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The ID of the wireless gateway.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the resource.

nested_items.name: GatewayEui
nested_items.description: The gateway's EUI value.

nested_items.name: RfRegion
nested_items.description: The frequency band (RFRegion) value.

nested_items.name: JoinEuiFilters
nested_items.description: A list of JoinEuiRange used by LoRa gateways to filter LoRa frames.
(list) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: NetIdFilters
nested_items.description: A list of NetId values that are used by LoRa gateways to filter the uplink frames.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SubBands
nested_items.description: A list of integer indicating which sub bands are supported by LoRa gateway.
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: Beaconing
nested_items.description: Beaconing object information, which consists of the data rate and frequency parameters.

nested_items.name: DataRate
nested_items.description: The data rate for gateways that are sending the beacons.

nested_items.name: Frequencies
nested_items.description: The frequency list for the gateways to send the beacons.
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: MaxEirp
nested_items.description: The MaxEIRP value.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name of the resource.

nested_items.name: ThingName
nested_items.description: The name of the thing associated with the wireless gateway. The value is empty if a thing isn't associated with the gateway.

nested_items.name: ThingArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the thing associated with the wireless gateway.
